relevant_findings.cardiopulmonary: Regular rate and rhythm (RRR). Non-labored breathing on room air.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Midline supraumbilical incisional scar. Soft, non-distended, tender to palpation over right lower quadrant with rebound tenderness and guarding.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm and well perfused. No edema.
relevant_findings.neurologic: Alert and oriented x 3. No deficits.
relevant_findings.anorectal: No lesions on inspection or digital rectal exam. Dark stools not grossly bloody but guaiac positive.
